name: Verify Region 1 to Region 2 Transition via Hibernation
description: Validates that after setting course, player can return to hibernation and successfully transition to Region 2.
testObjective: Ensure hibernation system correctly transitions player from Region 1 to Region 2.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has set course to Ladagocia
Ship screens have gone black (transit state)

steps.action: Navigate from cockpit back through the hallway
steps.expected: Player can navigate normally through hallway

steps.action: Check all rooms along the hallway route
steps.expected: No changes detected in any hallway rooms

steps.action: Navigate to the hibernation room at end of hallway
Interact with the Cryochamber using [E] or [LMB]
Wait for hibernation sequence to complete
Check developer tools or region indicators
steps.expected: System confirms player is now in Region 2

postconditions: Player has successfully transitioned to Region 2
